instructions:
Study Context: Proposers (Player 1) were asked to divide a $5 pie between themselves and an anonymous Receiver (Player 2). Player 2 had no power to reject the offer. Participants were paid their share in cash.

Decision Task Details:
A sum of $5 has been provisionally allocated to each pair... the person in Room A can propose how much of this each person is to receive... Person in Room A makes the proposal... Person in Room B is to receive {amount}... Person in Room A receives $5 - {amount}.

items.question: You are Player 1. You must decide how to divide a $5 pie between yourself and Player 2. Please specify the amount (in dollars) that Player 2 is to receive. (Player 1 will receive the remainder: $5 minus the amount given to Player 2).
